summary: In this context, 1,1,2-trichloroethene (TCE) is mentioned alongside halogenated alcohols in a discussion about the hydrolysis rates of various volatile organic compounds (VOCs). Both TCE and halogenated alcohols are categorized as halogenated compounds, and their hydrolysis half-lives are compared. However, there is no direct interaction or specific relationship detailed between TCE and halogenated alcohols beyond their classification and hydrolysis characteristics.
